üî• TODAY: Bitwise amended its Hyperliquid ETF filing, adding the 8-A, bps fee, and ticker $BHYP.
Bitwise amends Hyperliquid ETF filing, finalizes ticker and fee https://www.theblock.co/post/382574/bitwise-amends-hyperliquid-etf-filing-finalizes-ticker-fee?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social

Bitwise takes the next step on a Hyperliquid ETF   Bitwise has advanced its $HYPE  ETF proposal, framing the network as market infrastructure‚Äînot a speculative asset. The latest filing focuses on real mechanics: trading, pricing, custody, and fees, signaling confidence in regulatory feasibility.  This marks a broader shift in crypto ETFs‚Äîfrom betting on tokens to offering institutional exposure to entire onchain networks. Hyperliquid could be a test case for how far crypto‚Äôs infrastructure layer has come.
